statements: UPDATE QuantumKeysUsagePermissions SET last_usage_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE key_id = 1;

UPDATE QuantumKeysUsagePermissions SET permissions = 'READ,WRITE' WHERE key_id = 123
UPDATE QuantumKeysUsagePermissions SET last_usage_date = '2023-10-15', usage_description = 'Updated usage' WHERE key_id = 456
UPDATE KeyUsage SET usage_description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE KeyPermissions SET permission_type = 'admin' WHERE user_id = 5
UPDATE KeyUsage SET usage_description = 'Updated usage description' WHERE id = 1 AND user_id = 100;
UPDATE KeyPermissions SET permission_type = 'ADMIN' WHERE key_id = 10 AND user_id = 200;
UPDATE quantum_users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE quantum_keys SET expiration_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE key_id = 5;
UPDATE quantum_users SET permission_level = 2, email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE quantum_keys SET expiration_date = '2023-12-31', key_value = 'new_key_value' WHERE key_id = 5;
UPDATE quantum_keys SET key_value = 'new_value', creation_date = NOW() WHERE key_id = 1;
UPDATE key_usage SET user_id = 1001, usage_timestamp = '2022-07-15 08:30:00' WHERE usage_id = 3;
UPDATE quantum_keys SET key_value = 'new_value1' WHERE key_id = 1;
UPDATE key_permissions SET permission_type = 'admin' WHERE user_id = 10;
UPDATE quantum_cryptography_keys SET key_value = 'new_value' WHERE key_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE key_permissions SET permission_type = 'read_write' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE quantum_cryptography_keys SET usage_count = usage_count + 1 WHERE key_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE key_permissions SET permission_type = 'read_write' WHERE key_id = '223e4767-a99b-42d3-b456-426655441111' AND user_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-c456-426655442222';
